metadata.title: Universalum - Comprehensive Design and Construction
metadata.description: A group of companies engaged in engineering-geological and geodetic surveys, design, and construction works.

hero.title: Comprehensive Design and Construction of Facilities
hero.subtitle: A group of companies engaged in engineering-geological and geodetic surveys, design, and construction works — from foundations to ventilated facades with HPL panels, installation of transparent aluminum structures, glass roofs, and facades.

common.partnersDescription: We work with leading suppliers and partners, guaranteeing quality and reliability
common.whatOurClientsSay: What Our Clients Say About Us

services.title: We implement residential, commercial and infrastructure facilities

design.title: Design
design.description: Comprehensive preparation of project documentation for residential, commercial and public facilities. We perform engineering-geological and geodetic surveys, develop architectural solutions, coordinate with all authorities.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: We build buildings from scratch - foundation, monolithic, frame structures. We perform roofing, facade, finishing works, as well as landscaping. We have experience in implementing projects in difficult climatic and soil conditions.

engineering.title: Engineering Solutions
engineering.description: Development and installation of modern engineering systems: ventilation, heating, plumbing, electrical networks, lighting, waterproofing. We use energy-efficient technologies and quality materials for long-term and safe operation of the facility.

projects.description: We take on the full cycle of work - from conducting land plot potential analytics to completing construction and commissioning. We work responsibly, adhering to deadlines, building codes and standards.

testimonial1.content: The most important advantages of TDG COMPANY LLC include timely and high-quality work performance, staffing with highly qualified personnel, efficiency in work and responsibility for undertaken obligations
testimonial1.author: Chuley S.Y.

testimonial2.content: The company demonstrates the highest level of professionalism and responsibility. All project stages are completed exactly on time with compliance with all technical requirements. The attention to detail and willingness to meet customer wishes is particularly impressive
testimonial2.author: Kovalenko V.M.

testimonial3.content: Excellent process organization, individual approach to each project and professional team. All works are completed with quality and on time.
testimonial3.author: Petrenko M.I.

testimonial4.content: Cooperation with the company left only positive impressions. High level of professionalism, strict adherence to deadlines and quality of work performance deserve the highest rating.
testimonial4.author: Ivanenko O.V.

footer.description: Group of companies 'Universalum' and 'TDG COMPANY', which performs comprehensive work in the field of industrial and civil construction. Architectural design works. Construction and installation works. Comprehensive documentary support.

about.title: About Company

about.subtitle2: We work as a general designer and general contractor, offering a full range of services: from concept to project delivery.
